Hello!

I'm using ISO 690 Numerical Reference Extension and is very good, except writing out the bibliography. The problem appears when word write out [10]th reference. Example on figure: http://img37.imageshack.us/img37/6287/referm.jpg

Any suggestion?

Thanks.

It's a table, just widen the first column to fit your needs.

Yves
